<@U02M9ASB3GR> This article is a little dated but I found it to hold true while creating the styles for the email. Basically I added the styles and if the browser supported it...It looked pretty good. If they didn't then the Dark Mode wasn't the greatest experience, however if you are forward thinking with your email designs you can create a great experience for both. <https://sidemail.io/articles/dark-mode-in-html-email/>
Hey all, we should have this out this week or early next for sure.
Thank you, Tyler! This is super helpful.
